## Potato Leaves 

| Servings | Time | Source |
|:---|:---|:-------------------|
| 2  | 10 min | Alex | 


### Ingredients:

- 1 TBSP olive oil
- 2-3 cloves garlic, sliced
- Ginger (1 tsp ground or 1in fresh, minced)
- 8 cups sweet potato leaves
- &frac12; tsp salt or tamari to taste
- &frac12; sesame oil

### Directions 

- Heat pan over medium heat
- After heated, add:
  * 1 TBSP olive oil
  * 2-3 cloves garlic, sliced
  * Ginger (1 tsp ground or 1in fresh, minced)
- Saute for 1 minute
- Add 8 cups of sweet potato leaves and stir until mostly cooked down, if needed at &frac14; cup water to help cook down
- Add:
  * &frac12; tsp salt or tamari to taste
  * &frac12; sesame oil
      
### Notes 

Great side-dish if want more veggies, also good with rice.
